applications.name: Cracking the Cryptic 'Simarkism' Analyzer
applications.description: A WinUI 3 application uses the YouTube API to scan all the videos on the Cracking the Cryptic channel, searching for comments from "Inspiring Sand" and uses this data to compile statistics of "Simarkisms", total solve times and more. The application can also generate HTML that is then uploaded to my GitHub page so anyone can view the current statistics.

applications.name: EV Ownership Analyzer
applications.description: A WinUI 3 application that takes data from the Wallbox level 2 charger, Entergy, gas price data from the US eia API, and the KIA Owners Portal to calculate the cost of ownership of an EV compared to an ICE vehicle.

applications.name: La Crosse Weather Data Analyzer
applications.description: This WinUI3 application was made to parse weather data exported from the La Crosse View mobile app on either Android or iOS. Once loaded, there are readouts for highest and lowest outdoor, feels like temperature, and barometric pressure; highest day and total rain amount and highest wind speed.

applications.name: LEGO Rebrickable Set Inventory
applications.description: This WinUI3 application was made to open exported parts lists from Rebrickable and provide a local database of parts owned, still needed and other statistical information about the parts for the custom LEGO set.

applications.name: Plex Database Parser
applications.description: This WinUI3 application was created to replace the manual Microsoft Excel spreadsheet being used to inventory movies, holiday specials, TV shows, etc. on the Plex MyCloud Pro Series PR2100. The application can parse the available libraries on the Plex server and then export the results to Excel to be shared.

nugets.name: WinUI AppInfo Component
nugets.description: This is an Application Information modal that can be added to WinUI applications to display basic information about the application and environment including the application version, local device information and a shortcut to the application's local state (for logs, backups, etc.).

nugets.name: WinUI BaseApp Utilities and Helpers
nugets.description:
Basic application DI, logging, utilities and helpers for all WinUI applications including:
  • Scanning all Interfaces and adding Classes and ViewModels
  • Application and secret settings by default
  • Loads Serilog by default
  • Storage Extensions
  • General Utility Extensions
  • XAML Helper Extensions

nugets.name: WinUI HttpClient
nugets.description:
Base HTTP Client implementation for WinUI applications including:
  • GET
  • POST
  • GetFile
  • GetImage
  • Setting of cookies and headers

sites.name: Cracking the Cryptic Statistics Page
sites.description: This page is a public rendering of the data created from the Cracking the Cryptic application (repo here) I made to parse all of statistics in "Inspiring Sand's" comments on their YouTube videos.
